item.title: Fact-checking Donald Trump’s tweet firing Christopher Krebs
item.description: I was a source for thie “Pants on Fire!” fact check by PolitiFact on Donald Trump’s tweet that fired Christopher Krebs claiming that “The recent statement by Chris Krebs on the security of the 2020 Election was highly inaccurate, in that there were massive improprieties and fraud - including dead people voting, Poll Watchers not allowed into polling locations, “glitches” in the voting machines which changed…” PolitiFact: Fact-checking Donald Trump’s tweet firing Christopher Krebs, 18 November 2020

item.title: Voting Security
